meanings.definition: The act of reviving someone from unconsciousness or apparent death.
meanings.sent1: After the accident, the paramedics performed reanimations on the injured person.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use reanimations to bring back people who have fainted.
meanings.sent3: During the play, the actor pretended to do reanimations on the character who fainted.
meanings.sent4: The reanimations of the old TV show brought it back to life in the hearts of many viewers.
meanings.sent5: The reanimations in the movie were so realistic, they made the audience gasp in amazement.

meanings.definition: The process of restoring life or consciousness to something that was previously dead or unconscious.
meanings.sent1: In the science fiction story, scientists discovered a way to perform reanimations on extinct species.
meanings.sent2: The reanimations performed on the patient were successful, bringing them back to life.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved a reanimations act with a toy rabbit.
meanings.sent4: The reanimations of the old building turned it into a vibrant community center.
meanings.sent5: The reanimations of the garden after winter made it bloom with colorful flowers.
